dc:description: Pale buff clay with mottled brown glaze, worn especially on top.  Broken top and adjoining sides of lamp.  Nozzle missing.  Plain rim missing on left.  Raised panel at cross axis of lamp at side.  Circular groove between rim and discus.  Triumphal chariot, a quadriga, on discus, moving to right.  Latticed sides of chariot are built high and has canopy.  Ring handle, two grooves on upper half.  Base missing but was set off by groove.  Fragment in two pieces but mended.
